content:
Opinion:

In the opinion of assessment team, emission factor values that were applied in the calculations is consistent with registered PDD /05/ and correctly applied in MR /1.2/, emission reduction spread sheet /2.2/ and justified.

Assessment of Data and Calculation of GHG emission reductions:

According to the approved methodology ACMOOO2, Version 16.0, Emission Reductions are calculated as follows:

Baseline Emissions

The baseline emissions are calculated as follows:

BEy = EGpuy * EFgria,cmy

Where:

BEy = Baseline emissions in year y(tCO2/yr) EGp, y = Quantity of net electricity genenration that is produced and fed into the grid as a result of the implementation of the VCS project activity in year y(MWh/yr) EF gria,cmy = Combined margin CO2 emission factor for grid connected power generation in year y(tC02/MWh)
